column2: yashhad al-‘ubbād jumlatun fī al-ḥuḍḍar wālbād

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. tkhlīl raṣd. qaṣīdah. basīṭun li’abī al-ṭīb al-nafzī

column2: ant al-muná wal-manāyā fīk qud jumi‘at
wabī min al-shawq dā’un lā dawā’ lah

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. birūālah raṣd. malḥūnun lisayyidī muḥammad al-ḥarrāq
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. tawshīḥ raml lābin sahil
